title: Amy Acker joins Good Day to talk about Person of Interest
author: POISuit
comment: Amy is so sweet, beautiful, and girl next door.  She has portrayed characters from Fred to Root in such fine matter.  She can be the sweet shy Sophie in Novel Romance.  Cast perfectly as Crystal in Dear Santa.  Amy dazzled us with the charming killer for hire Root for 3 plus seasons on Person of Interest.  This woman is almost too good to be true!!
Thank you for sharing this video.  I love Amy Acker -- she just killed it as Root -- I'm still in mourning.
Amo a esta hermosa y espectacular mujer!!!! Amy es una Diosa y una dulzura de mujer

smiling "don't know if peaceful or just a trap" 

I've just got reported that the interviewer got murdered by coldblood killer using "Root" alias, suspect still remain unknow so far...
